= Introduction =

FictionBook is a single file XML based ebook format. The current version is version 2. You need an ebook reader to read fb2 format (or a converter to convert from fb2 to something else). More information on fb2http://haali.cs.msu.ru/pocketpc/FictionBook_description.html

= Viewers/converters =

Lots of different viewers/converters:
  * excellent windows based viewer http://haali.cs.msu.ru/pocketpc/index.html.en
  * FBreader cross platform but not PocketPC :-(
  * http://code.google.com/p/fb2pdf/ (note I've not used this)
